name: Fix The Damn Dam - Global Game Jam 2020
name_original: Fix The Damn Dam - Global Game Jam 2020
description:
Fix The Damn Dam is a simple RTS (Real Time Strategy) game where you help a small group of beavers rebuild their lost dam !

Controls :

-Keyboard arrows or WASD to move the camera 

-Left click to select a Beaver

-Rick click to move it to a Location/Object or to drag a Log

Made in 48h by 4 People during the Global Game Jam 2020

Credits:
